channel.title: Can a mod delete this please thank you
channel.description:
hi, i want to know the codes on how to make npc's and make them into shops my server is berky-scape based :) and also how to put what items in i want to sell..?
thanks purepkworld
edit: the reason for deletion is that someone else has the same question on the forums so i can wait for the answers to come up there thanks
